Note: This is a remux combining YIFY's video stream with 5.1 AC3 from Zen_Bud's rip. No re-encoding  was done. The original files were simply demuxed to remove the needed data stream and remuxed to place the best available size/quality and ENGLISH subtitle into a single file.


I'm a big fan of YIFY's work, but for me at least, the audio in general is a little overly compressed. So when I can find a better copy of the audio, I fix it... ;-)

All props to YIFY and Zen_Bud for their excellent work!

Also, the included XML file is for a WDTVLiveHub moviesheet.
